data.message:
To Whom it May Concern:

Apparently Facebook has removed the Ticker & 'Show Ticker' option from a select group of Facebook users. My Ticker began hiding itself over a week ago but would reappear when I clicked the 'Show Ticker' option. Then the 'Show/Hide Ticker' option disappeared completely from the Sidebar settings menu along with the Ticker. Since then, I haven't been able to use the Ticker at all. I have reported it to Facebook NUMEROUS times and posted about it in the forums. Other people have the same problem but Facebook has been completely unresponsive to our complaints. 

I have NOT hidden the Ticker. I have used the "Help" Center and checked everything it suggested. My wife still has her Ticker and I checked with a couple of friends and they still have their Tickers, along with the 'Show/Hide Ticker' option. I have tried using different browsers (MS Edge, Firefox and Chrome) on at least five different computers and still no Ticker. I installed and uninstalled the Facebook app from the MS App Store. I've been a Facebook user for over SEVEN years and a computer repair professional for over FORTY years. I've been reporting this EPIC Facebook FAIL to the horribly unresponsive Facebook "support team" for over a week and continue to receive the same idiotic canned response: ""Your feedback will be used to improve Facebook. Thanks for taking the time to make a report.""

I have been posting this wherever & whenever possible to try to get the attention of an actual human being with a brain who works at Facebook. I'm not holding my breath but will continue to post it until it gets resolved.
 😠 😤 😤

replies.message: My ticker has been gone for over a week now too and I've tried everything suggested to restore it!  Wish they would fix it!  *stomps foot* 😤
I'm really starting to hate Facebook.
